classification: Tools, Equipment and Utilitarian Objects; Ceremonial Objects
creditline: Gift of Mr.and Mrs. Augustus L. Searle
department: Chinese, South and Southeast Asian Art
description: carved rhinoceros horn libation cup; in form of an old bamboo incense burner; it has side coiled dragon handle, and is decorated with designs of conventional animalistic heads and cloud patterns enclosed in borders of geometrical key patterns; carved wood base
title: Libation Cup
